name: PioPio
backstory: This actually started out as a birthday gift from my old roommate who made me a pokemon trainer version of myself. I started using it as my online persona, while slowly getting some more updated versions of it, the one you see around the site is what I use today!
funFacts: The bag they're wearing contains blind box collectibles, particularly Smiskis and Peach Riot figures.

name: Milo
backstory: Milo started out out learning how to fight from an old monk who lived in an abandoned temple in the jungle near his home. Hoping to learn less boring stuff and focus more on fighting he followed a travelling troupe of fighters to the Astrodome!
funFacts: They don't contain any outfits that aren't just luchador themed.

images.description:
Credit to Artist: AlexSanders
 My first commissioned actual art of Milo, I liked the tattoo/outfit we came up with, but the size made him look too human, so after a while a while I decided to move from this one

Credit to Artist: miithers
 A group shot of the whole party in a cuddle pile, organized by Micachu for the end of our campaign!

Credit to Artist: Raf4Art
 An active pose for Milo, he's much more halfling sized here and he's showing off his very confident/fun demeanor when it comes to fighting.
